data.text:
Neat and clean place with very friendly and supportive staff. But the location is bit isolated. 

Metro is in walking distance. Few supermarkets and only a few restaurants nearby (in walking distance)

Hats off for the support given by Mr. Madhu and the team.
data.title: Fantastic

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Navigator60018966746,

Greetings from Element Al Jaddaf Dubai! 

We highly appreciate your recent stay with us.

Being thrilled to deliver superlative service we are so delighted to know that you had an excellent experience and sincerely grateful for the time you spent for writing a positive comment. We appreciate for the warm words towards our team members in particularly from Mr. Madhu. I assure you that your kind words and compliments have been conveyed to him and to the rest of the team. Your feedback is valuable for us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back again. 

With kindest regards,

Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Element Al Jaddaf

data.text:
The staff was super friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean and the view was breathtaking. Perfect spot for a cozy stay for a family. Mr Joseph was extremely helpful and professional and made our stay even more comfortable.
Highly recommend hotel to spent your vacation.
data.title: Thank you element

data.text: The Element is truly fantastic! The place is beautiful, peaceful, clean, and has stellar service. Their hospitality is excellent. The free breakfasts are delicious, available long enough that you can wake up late and still eat, and show case the diverse nature of the area by offering many options to choose from. We especially enjoyed the different kinds of fresh juice every morning. We were able to readily use a taxi app to get from the Element to any where in Dubai and back each day. Finally, when my flight was canceled, they were extremely patient and accommodating while I figured out my next steps, and with only an hours notice they extended my stay and kindly kept me in my same room. Ryan and Ghadeer were patient, kind, respectful, and understanding.
data.title: Top notch service, beautiful accommodations

data.text:
My experience at the Element by Westin Hotel was extremely pleasant. The service was excellent in every aspect, from room cleanliness to the kindness and professionalism of the staff, especially Ghadeer, Ryan, and Alum, who treated us like close friends and offered assistance without hesitation. Surely, I will not hesitate to book my accommodation at the same place on my next visit.

Mujtaba Alkareem
data.title: I recommend choosing this hotel

data.text:
“The hotel was absolutely amazing! The service is above expectations, as the crew was always very helpful and kind, especially Ghadeer, Rayan, and Al-Alum. The rooms were incredible, very clean and equipped with everything you could need. The location is unbeatable, as the hotel is only a few steps away from all the main tourist attractions. The food in the restaurant is irresistible, they have a wide variety of options to satisfy all tastes.

Personally, I will not look for another hotel in the future, as this hotel is the perfect choice for me.”
data.title: Good one
